text: Big Data offers a huge competitive
advantage to organizations that use it
wisely in fact there's a waterfall of
information waiting to be tapped in your
business's production data log data
workflows and more you can unlock new
patterns Drive New insights and reinvent
the way you do business for example Yelp
is using big data to Crunch over 100
million statistics daily and serve up
personalized recommendations to its
customers meanwhile NASA jet propulsion
laboratory uses big data to dramatically
accelerate scientific discovery by
rapidly processing billion pixel images
of the Martian surface and they're not
alone in fact the big data market is
predicted to grow to $50 billion by
2017 it only makes sense that more and
more companies are getting involved
especially when you consider that every
dollar invested in analytics has been
shown to yield up to $10 back so how can
we make good on the promise of Big Data
how do we move from hype to execution
and and finally to Insight Amazon web
services can help you get there fast
without straining your budget regardless
of how big your business is AWS makes it
simple to provision the infrastructure
and software needed to drive your big
data projects forward start by putting
your data in the Amazon simple storage
service or Amazon S3 which is designed
for 119s of durability with no single
point of failure then launch an Amazon
elastic map produce cluster a cluster is
multiple servers linked together that
function as as a single system Amazon
EMR uses the Apache Hadoop framework on
the Amazon elastic compute cloud or
Amazon ec2 which leverages the latest
Intel xon processors when the data has
finished processing you can place your
results in the Amazon red shift data
warehouse for easy storage and data
analysis you'll benefit from Intel
Advanced Vector extensions which
accelerates Technical computations and
reduces the time needed to process your
data and Intel aesn for fast data
protection and exceptional secur
security so how much does all this cost
with on demand instances you pay only
for what you use reserved instances let
you make a low payment upfront to
reserve capacity and reduce costs and
spot instances allow you to bid for
unused Amazon ec2 instances at even
lower costs the latest technology for
Big Data simple to use and cost
effective with Amazon web services and
Intel the possibilities are
endless to see more great examples of
what the AWS Cloud can do for your
business visit cloud insights.com
